nodes.text: The Galactic Trials was a series of four podracing courses on Outer Rim worlds.
This series was followed by the Podracing Open and the Hutt Championships.
The event was partly sponsored by the SoroSuub Corporation, who also offered their facility on Sullust as a race track.
The Galactic Trials was the first podracing tournament faced by players in the game Star Wars: Racer Revenge.
